A dinner guest's invocation for his host.ARABIC_TEXT: ((اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَهُمْ فِيمَا رَزَقْتَهُم، وَاغْفِرْ لَهُمْ وَارْحَمْهُمْ)).
A dinner guest's invocation for his host.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Allahumma barik lahum feema razaqtahum, waghfir lahum warhamhum.)
A dinner guest's invocation for his host.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (O Allah, bless for them, that which You have provided them, forgive them and have mercy upon them.)
